short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculate the cents per point value based on the website you're on.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculate the cents per point value based on the website you're on. Enter in the cash value of your flight or hotel stay, then enter the points value, and the extension will calculate the CPP and compare it to the standard points value. Works for almost all the most popular airline and hotel rewards programs.
